The provided code chunk is part of a method in a Python class that creates and configures GUI elements for a slider or valuater widget. The code initializes and packs widgets, including a label for displaying the maximum value, and sets up the slider component based on a specified style (e.g., VALUATOR_MINI).

self._widget.pack(side = tk.LEFT, expand=1, fill=tk.X)

            # Max label
            self._maxLabel = tk.Label(parent, text = self['max'], width = 8,
                                      anchor = tk.W)
            self._maxLabel.pack(side = tk.LEFT)
